#### Description

```gherkin
As a <type of user>
I want <some goal>
So that <some reason>
```

#### Satisfactory Conditions

- [ ] Conditions may contain additional details necessary to complete the story.
- [ ] Some stories _may_ need to be broken down into smaller stories.
- [ ] Don't overthink it.
